column1: [[Image:Daniel Reeve - Lettering.gif|thumb|250px|An assortment of letterings done by [[Daniel Reeve]]. (Unfortunately these are not available fonts)]]
Several '''fonts''' based on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s work or its adaptations have been made. This page lists several of them.
Several of these fonts are [[tengwar]] or [[angerthas]]. These do not have a one-on-one transliteration with Latin script. Usually
column2: some guide to the proper usage is included.

column1: ''[http://www.thehutt.de/tolkien/fonts.html Listing courtesy of the Tolkien Font Page at Thehutt.de]''
'''Ringbearer Medium''' - The font from the "Lord of the Rings" title logo.
'''Aniron''' - The font from the "Lord of the Rings" end credits.
'''Albertus MT''' - The font from the movie subtitle ("The Fellowship of the Ring") of the "Lord of the Rings" logo.
'''Elven Common Speak''' - Latin alphabet in Elvish style
'''Elvish Ring NFI''' - Latin font in Tengwar Cursive style
'''Fanjofey AH''' (2 Fonts) - Latin fonts in hand-written Tengwar style

column2: similar to the font in the "Lord of the Rings" credits. But not very similar.

column1: '''Hobbiton''' - A font from the maps and signs of Hobbiton
'''Hobbiton Brushed''' - A font from the maps and signs of Hobbiton
'''Kelt''' - A font similar to what is used in the movie.
'''Party Business''' - A font from the sign at Bilbo's door
'''Runic''' (3 Fonts) - Western font in Rune style. The example shows "GANDALF FOR PRESIDENT". Upper case is in Cyrillic.
'''Viking''' - Another fantasy font in celtic style.
*[http://tengwar.art.pl/tengwar/fonty.php Tengwar na PC : fonty] Polish page with a list of tengwar fonts with their links.
* [http://www.danielreeve.co.nz/Fonts/ Purchase Tolkien Fonts from Daniel Reeve]
